summary: Changes most bear and draugr sound effetcs.
descriptionHtml:
Changes most draugr and bear sound effects. Bears make evil laughs as well as exaggerated screams and other such things. 
Draugr also have evil laughs, and will occasiobally talk in a scary voice, as well as scary screams. 
Makes Caves and dungeons slightly more interesting. 

To Install:
Just extract the contents of the RAR into your Skyrim Data Folder. 

Note:
May conflict with other mods that change bear/draugr sounds. You could pick and choose between sounds though.
author: Andrew the Draugr
